## ramp status

Show project and repository status

### Synopsis

Show comprehensive status information for the ramp project.

Displays current branch and status for all source repositories,
active features, and project configuration details.

```
ramp status [flags]
```

### Options

```
  -h, --help   help for status
```

```
  -v, --verbose   Show detailed output during operations
```
